CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Harvest Cooperative relative to Sunstone Farms?
SRP.A: Golden Harvest Cooperative is {above} Sunstone Farms in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Golden Harvest Cooperative?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {below} Golden Harvest Cooperative in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total livestock production?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Golden Harvest Cooperative}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sunstone Farms's maximum Livestock Production in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sunstone Farms's maximum Livestock Production is in {1996}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Sunstone Farms's minimum Livestock Production in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Sunstone Farms's minimum Livestock Production is in {1970}.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1987, did the total Livestock Production experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1993?
NC.A: The change in total livestock production between 1973 and 1987 was {smaller} than between 1978 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1994, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1977 and 1994?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1978 and 1994 was {higher} than between 1977 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Livestock Production in 1975 higher or lower than in 1991?
NC.A: The total livestock production in 1975 was {lower} than in 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1991, was the average total Livestock Production higher or lower than between 1972 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total livestock production between 1972 and 1991 was {lower} than between 1972 and 1993.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Sunstone Farms} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Sunstone Farms and Golden Harvest Cooperative first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Sunstone Farms and Golden Harvest Cooperative did not exchange leading positions.
